---
title: "Multiple bibliographies"
subtitle: "Basic example"

# Use the multibib extension
filters:
  - multibib

# Turn off YAML validation
validate-yaml: false

# Define list of separate bibliography files
bibliography:
    main: samszo.bib
    app: cvReferencesBart.bib

# Disable citeproc
citeproc: false

format: 
  html: 
    toc: true
  pdf: default
---
